There are a whole bunch of different versions of NEAT and HyperNEAT.  I lin=
k most of them from my homepage here:

http://www.cs.ucf.edu/~kstanley/#sof=
tware

I am guessing that you are using my version of NEAT from about 2002.=
  I think that's still a good version and it should work.  However, there a=
re other options available as well, so it's really a matter of your prefere=
nce.

HyperNEAT is an extension of NEAT, so it is not the same thing as NEA=
T.  However, HyperNEAT implementations contain NEAT within them, since Hype=
rNEAT extends NEAT.

ken

..> wrote:
>
> Hi, I has experimenting with coevolving predator and prey cr=

ble has from 2001 (or 2002, don't remember now). There is a newer version o=
f the NEAT source code? Is HyperNEAT the "evolution" source code for NEAT? =
Which of them I should use?
> 
> Thanks for your answers.
>
